<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a BNE on the cmpxchg comparison result immediately follows the cmpxchg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operation, it can be folded into the cmpxchg expansion by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modifying the branch within &#39;LoopHead&#39; (which performs the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comparison). This is a valid transformation because after altering the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopHead&#39;s BNE destination, the BNE following the cmpxchg becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// redundant and and be deleted. In the case of a masked cmpxchg, an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appropriate AND and BNE must be matched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On success, returns true and deletes the matching BNE or AND+BNE, sets the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopHeadBNETarget argument to the target that should be used within the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop head, and removes that block as a successor to MBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-riscvexpandatomicpseudoinsts-cpp-/#aa167eef8fffa86a11c06e11e5cfbc692"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-riscvexpandatomicpseudoinsts-cpp-/#aa167eef8fffa86a11c06e11e5cfbc692">tryToFoldBNEOnCmpXchgResult</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DestReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> CmpValReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> MaskReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;LoopHeadBNETarget) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
